column5: That's an Atlantic. Someone had to say it. My 40"er in May looks like a missle compared to that nuclear submarine! Great photos Dan. -Brian
Congrads! ... Since your also form Burlington you should take me on your new boat:P  I kid i kid.  I'm Happy for you
WOW.....what a beast    Congratulation Dan on this amazing catch  How does it feel to be the owner of a new ride?? Leechman
Congrats Dan. Nice to see one of the board members win big.  Mike
SWEET!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  That fish is a brute for sure, nuff said.  Congrats on the win. Enjoy.
Simply awesome news Dan! Glad you're hard work came through and it couldn't have happened to a nicer guy!
very nice fish buddy, congrats on the new boat way to go
Wow nice pics Dan that fish is fatter than you too bad I won't see your new boat much because you will really leave me behind now
That is the biggest Lake O salmon I have ever seen.  The first pic is a classic.  Congratulations, Dan, just fabulous.
Congrats on the fish and beauty prize pack that goes with it.
Thats awesome! Enjoy the toys
Congratulations to the Dan!!!  You da man!!!
Nice job, great fish, have fun with the new toy.

Well congrats cousin I must admit I was visiting that website a few times per day and my nails became a bit shorter.  Well deserved prize  Call you in a week we are leaving in the morning on vacation  Mike
That's flippin AWESOME Dan!  !!!!!!! Your gonna love that windshield on Quinte in November! Couldn't have happened to a better guy! Again... Congrats! HH
Congrats!! enjoy the new toy!
That's AMAZING Dan!!!!  Congrats to you, look forward to the pictures of your new ride....especially with some new fish slime in it  Maureen
Very nicely done! Congrats!
Congrats Dan.    Look forward to seeing it in Quinte.  It couldn't have happened to a nicer guy.
WTG, thats great...
Awsome, way to go.  Gonna see a new avatar pic in the near future?
Oh just a reminder GCD that was a boat with a tiller that caught the winning salmon to win a side console boat
wow great news!!!!!!!!!!!  cheers!
....Well done Dan. You're going to love the new ride I can assure you of that.
Well done Dan.  All the hard work looks like it paid off.
DUDE!!!!!!  Ought to go! Bring it over when you get it!!!   Darren
WTG DAN   WTG
I'm really happy fer ya Dan. You worked for it, you deserve it. My heartfelt congrats to you. Would the organizers maybe upgrade  it to a tiller though?
Awesome, WTG on the win!

Thanks again every body I will post the picture later today or tommorrow that will be in the Tuesdays Sun of my winning fish.She is a brute. And again thaks for all your well wishes. A very happy OFNer Dan
And to boot I have a 42" Great lakes salmon to add to team catch22.
Congrats!!!! Very Nice Fish!!!!
42! Thats abeast man, cannot wait to see it! We have to get together sometime, been a bad summer for me but have some time off coming.
congrats dan!! soooooo.. whatcha gonna do with that old lund of your's?? lol

Here are a couple pics of the BRUTE  Here is a head shot  Some BIG teeth  one more head shot  And my contribution to team CATCH22 at 42 " a GREAT lakes Salmon   Now come on Sept 13 for the big fish off and to pick up my sweet new ride. But it will also be a sad day because I wont need two boats and my 2005 Lund Classic wil have to go. I hope she ends up with a good home because it has been a great boat with alot of great memories. I will miss it.And again thanks to the Great OFC family for pulling for me. And a special thanks to my family for giving me the time to do what I love to do the most fish. And my Brother Brent for helping me to learn to cath these big brutes.
Simply amazing congrats.

ITS NOW OFFICIAL Well dan a.k.a. percher won week 5 in the great ontario salmon derby with his big 34.72lb Chinook salmon,and won a brand new lund boat with a 90hp mercury & a new trailer,and all rigged out in walker riggers,and a whole bunch of goodies,total package worth over $40,000 !!!!    congrats dan,you earned it and worked hard fishing lakeo for that big,honkin chinny well done buddy!!!! cant wait to see your picture of that big monster!!!! i hope you do well in the fish-off in a few weeks as well,i hope i can still make it in as well,man im trying real hard!!!   cheers
congrats and enjoy the new toys
SUPER CONGRATS!!!!!!!!!!
WOW!!!  Nice shooting!  Happened to a great guy as well.
Way to go Dan enjoy your new ride  Rob
Great Job!
Great Job! Now what are you going to do with a console
SUPER CONGRATS!!!    :worthy:
WOW! Congratulations are definitely in order! You must have been crossing your fingers right to the finish!!! Your family must be thrilled for you! Enjoy your new ride!!!
WOW.......been watching and pullin for ya...  CONGRATULATIONS.......  Cheers  Craig
Maybe someone can post the link ?? im not to sure how to do that   or i would have...thanks
Thanks Guys its been a tough week.Nail biteing and no sleep now its over HEE HAW! http://www.sportsmensshows.com/cgi-bin/sal...amp;page=report
Dude!!
That is just unreal, you must be SO happy.  Big time congrats!
totally sweet!!! thats an amazing prize to win, especially for just catching a fish!   lets get some PIX!!!!!!!!!!!!
WOW!!! I've been refreshing that results page for the past few days hoping to still see your name on top.  Congrats.....well deserved!!!  Proud to know you Dan!
right on...you must be  shappy as a hig in pit over that one man  ..let's see some pics of the new ride
Sweet!I can see the OFC stickers on it now!Good job bud! Joe
Nice! Waytago.  JF
High Fives to ya Percher.   Congrats.

This is just Awesome Dan.  I've been hoping all week nobody would top you.  I was kind of happy the weather went for a crap as that would keep more people off the lake  Well deserved and couldn't have happened to a more deserving guy  Joey
Congrats percher. Nice to see an OFC member win.
Fan-freakin-tastic Dan, it couldn't happen to a nicer guy! -Brian
Wow, what a win, well deserved, i'm sure it was alot of time involved, let's see that baby!!!
WOW.. that   is realy great..................congrats
